mapper.insert: insert into cfg_type (id, name, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select cs.* from cfg_type_source cts left join cfg_source cs on cs.id = cts.sourceid left JOIN cfg_type ct on ct.id = cts.typeid where cts.typeid = queryParam.typeid and (cs.verstion like concat("%",#{queryParam.verstion},"%")) and (cs.platform like concat("%",#{queryParam.platform},"%"))
